org.nahid.domain

Interface BookList

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileStock

    public interface BookList
    The interface for the inventory as provided by Contribe. A few methods were added.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(Book book, int quantity) 
      int[] buy(Book... books) 
      Book getBookByID(int id)
      Returns the book with the given ID.
      int getID(Book b)
      Returns the ID of a book.
      Book[] list(String searchString) 

    • Method Detail

      • list

        Book[] list(String searchString)

      • add

        boolean add(Book book,
            int quantity)

      • buy

        int[] buy(Book... books)

      • getID

        int getID(Book b)
   throws NoSuchBookException
        Returns the ID of a book. It is implied that books carry an internal ID in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        b - The book for which you want to look up the inventory ID
        Returns:
        The ID of the book, as an int - the inventory is assumed to keep IDs for all the books.
        Throws:
        NoSuchBookException - if the Book is not found the inventory.

      • getBookByID

        Book getBookByID(int id)
          throws NoSuchBookException
        Returns the book with the given ID. A Convenience method for looking up a book from an ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID for which you want to look up the Book
        Returns:
        the Book with this ID
        Throws:
        NoSuchBookException - if the ID is not known by the inventory.
